page.title: 09LINHOPE VILLAGE
page.content: Linhope is located in a deep valley on the Linhope burn. It can only be reached by using the private road from Hartside.This hamlet is dominated by a large country-house.Until recently the house was owned by a single family but now, after the death of the owner the house is now run as an old-folks home. The other houses in the hamlet are inhabited by either workers of the home or by the farm-workers.The hamlet is surrounded by trees (mostly conifers), and is a popular place for trippers to the area to walk to (cars are left at Hartside). In winter the place can be almost cut-off by snow for days on end and the steepness of the surrounding hills limits the amount of sun. In summer the hamlet can be a sun-trap and very much hotter than surrounding areas.
